1.0.name: wordpress/wp-digi-clock-plugin-01beta
1.0.description: Embeds a flash digital clock either in a post, page or within your page template. The background and font colours are managed via the options menu. The clock either displays the time as set on the users local machine or as set by your web server with an optional offset. It has 12hr (am / pm) or 24hr clock formats.
